Tech Stack #

This documentation site was built with the following technologies:

  • Vite (v7.1.14) - Fast build tool and dev server
  • TypeScript (~5.9.3) - Type-safe JavaScript
  • Lit - Web components and HTML templating
  • Carbon Design System - IBMâ€™s enterprise web component library
  • markdown-it - Markdown parser
  • gray-matter - YAML frontmatter parsing

Custom Static Site Generator #

Rather than using an off-the-shelf solution, we built a custom static site generator as a Vite plugin. This gives us complete control over the documentation experience while keeping the codebase minimal and tailored to Meowbaseâ€™s needs.

Built with AI #

This documentation site and the custom SSG were developed with assistance from Claude 4.5 Sonnet (Anthropic), demonstrating how modern AI tools can help create sophisticated web applications while maintaining clean, readable code.
